professional_summary: Medical Lab Technician with expertise in psychiatric services, SQL database administration, and technical support.

key_responsibilities: Interact with patients seeking help for addictions or psychiatric needs
particularly those on the Suboxone/Subutex program.
Work with MD/NP/PA to determine patient suitability for continued screening.
Supervise patients during drug screens based on previous results.
Troubleshoot and resolve database and operating system issues.
Execute scripts using SQL and T-SQL.
Ensure customer satisfaction by addressing requests via phone and email.
Reassure customers with diagnostics and potential solutions for iOS devices.
Train customers on effective device usage.
Collaborate with business owners to select appropriate devices.

education.institution: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
